text: Nieuwe rapportageanalyseert Amerika's gezondheidszenkosten crisis"🚨 Nieuwsflash! 🚨Het is officieel: de gezondheidszenkosten in Amerika zijn out of control! 😱 According to a recent report by PayZen, many Americans are struggling to afford healthcare. 💸🤕On average, people can only afford $97 per month for out-of-pocket medical costs. 💸 That's not even enough for a fancy coffee! ☕️The report also shows that people are skipping important medical care because of the cost. 🤕 Preventive visits, prescription drugs, mental health care, and diagnostic testing are all being neglected. 🙅‍♂️ It's like people are playing a game of Russian roulette with their health! 🤯But fear not, dear Americans! 🇺🇸 PayZen is here to save the day! 💪 With their cutting-edge technology, they're making healthcare affordable again. ���ety_� And that's not all!
